statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, grant_amount, project_status FROM grant_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status, grant_amount, start_date, project_id, end_date FROM grant_projects;
SELECT * FROM grant_projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT project_name, grant_amount FROM grant_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM grant_projects ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, grant_amount, project_status FROM grant_projects WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY project_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM grant_projects WHERE end_date > '2021-12-31' AND grant_amount BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000 ORDER BY grant_amount ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM grant_projects WHERE project_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM grant_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT project_name, grant_amount FROM grant_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY grant_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS milestone_count FROM Projects LEFT JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, milestone_description, milestone_date FROM Projects JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id WHERE milestone_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, milestone_description FROM Projects INNER JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id WHERE milestone_status = 'completed';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(milestone_id) AS milestone_count FROM Projects LEFT JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_name;

SELECT project_name, MAX(milestone_date) AS latest_milestone_date FROM Projects INNER JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY latest_milestone_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, grant_amount FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM progress_updates JOIN milestones ON progress_updates.milestone_id = milestones.milestone_id;
SELECT milestone_name, completion_date FROM milestones WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE grant_amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, milestone_name, completion_date FROM projects JOIN milestones ON projects.project_id = milestones.project_id;

SELECT project_name, milestone_name, update_date, progress_description FROM projects JOIN milestones ON projects.project_id = milestones.project_id JOIN progress_updates ON milestones.milestone_id = progress_updates.milestone_id;

SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, grant_amount, milestone_name, completion_date, progress_description FROM projects JOIN milestones ON projects.project_id = milestones.project_id JOIN progress_updates ON milestones.milestone_id = progress_updates.milestone_id WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM GrantProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM GrantProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Milestones WHERE milestone_id = 3;
SELECT milestone_name, completion_date FROM Milestones WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM GrantProviders WHERE provider_type = 'Government';
SELECT * FROM GrantProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM GrantProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, grant_amount FROM GrantProjects WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT project_name, milestone_name, completion_date FROM GrantProjects INNER JOIN Milestones ON GrantProjects.project_id = Milestones.project_id;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, contact_email FROM GrantProviders WHERE provider_type = 'Funding';
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM Project;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, status FROM Milestone ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, assigned_to FROM Task WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM Team WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, status FROM Milestone WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY milestone_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT task_name, task_description, assigned_to FROM Task WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT team_name, team_lead FROM Team INNER JOIN Team_Member ON Team.team_id = Team_Member.team_id WHERE role = 'Developer'
SELECT * FROM Team_Member WHERE role <> 'Manager' ORDER BY member_name ASC
